articles.title: There is currently no way to finish Star Wars: KOTOR II on the Switch - The Verge
articles.description: Game developer Aspyr has admitted that there is currently no way to finish the game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II on the Nintendo Switch. It promises a fix is en route.
articles.content:
Aspyr says its aware of the issue and working fix it
